name: nodejs
description: - Javascript runtime environment - built on Js - it allows to run js code on server - basically it allows the js not just in browser but anywhere else like normal programing - it allows to run js out of the browser - node js uses V8 is js engine build by google that allowed the js run in browser - node js ->uses -> chrome V8 engine -> compiles the js -> machine code || v8 self written in C++
author: Gopi Mudmal
